thread.title: BRIEF-Owens Corning Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.04

title: BRIEF-Owens Corning Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.04
text: 40 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Owens Corning Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.04 Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Owens Corning: * REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 * Q4 SALES ROSE 16 PERCENT TO $1.6 BILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.11 * ‍COMPANY EXPECTS GENERAL CORPORATE EXPENSES TO BE BETWEEN $140 MILLION AND $150 MILLION IN 2018​ * ‍CAPITAL ADDITIONS IN 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO TOTAL APPROXIMATELY $500 MILLION​ * INTEREST EXPENSE IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $125 MILLION - $130 MILLION FOR 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
